value.title: Nokia unveils the world’s first telecom AI library
value.excerpt: Nokia has released a library of artificial intelligence (AI) use cases for telecommunication providers through a public cloud, an industry first. Developed in collaboration with Microsoft, the Nokia AVA AI-as-a-service combines Nokia's security framework with Microsoft Azure's digital architecture to help communications service providers (CSPs) take on 5G and cloud computing challenges.

value.excerpt: Dozens of smaller facial recognition companies have taken over for Amazon, IBM and Microsoft in providing police departments with tools.

value.title: Microsoft Partners With Chinese Solution Provider to Boost IT Efficiency and Security
value.excerpt: Microsoft’s China arm is partnering with Chinese electronic shelf label (ESL) provider Hanshow to empower its global expansion in the retail industry. Under the strategic collaboration, Hanshow will adopt Microsoft Azure operated by 21Vianet for its operations while also prioritizing Microsoft technology for its solutions to retail clients.

value.title: In the race for tech talent, the US should look to Mexico
